pageContext.claim: “Our Country was built on Tariffs, and Tariffs are now leading us to great new Trade Deals - as opposed to the horrible and unfair Trade Deals that I inherited as your President. Other Countries should not be allowed to come in and steal the wealth of our great U.S.A. No longer!”
pageContext.analysis: While Trump harkens back to the days when the United States was a developing country and used tariffs to protect nascent industries, tariffs in the modern era have led to economic catastrophe, such as the  Smoot–Hawley Tariff which exacerbated the Great Depression.
